name: Form::MovingAndHandling
description: Returns all data from Moving and Handling for ehr_id

steps.processorData:
SELECT e/ehr_id, c
FROM EHR e
CONTAINS COMPOSITION c[openEHR-EHR-COMPOSITION.encounter.v1]
WHERE c/name/value='Moving and Handling Assessment and Care Plan'
AND e/ehr_id/value = :ehrId
OFFSET 0 LIMIT 10
